_header: Rejoice ye realms of England and France
_description: [? John Lydgate]. Roundel on the Coronation of Henry VI — ten lines (ababababba)

BLHar7333.First Lines:
Reioice ye Reames of englond & of ffraunceA braunche þat
                    sprang oute of the floure delys
BLHar7333.Last Lines:
As was thi fader by Circumspect adviseStable in vertue withoute
                    variaunce
BLHar7333.Attributed Title:
…And folowith A Roundell of him ayens / his coronacioun made by
                    lydegate daun John (f. 32vb); Explicit (f.
                    32vb)
